is.hi.Core

Class BookingController

  • java.lang.Object
    • is.hi.Core.BookingController

  • public class BookingController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller class for everything concerning booking a flight
    Author:
    dantg

    • Constructor Detail

      • BookingController

        public BookingController(DatabaseController db)
        Initialises the BookingController. Creates an active booking with new booking number. Active booking is the booking that the bookingController will do actions to when functions are called, e.g. adding tickets.
        Parameters:
        db - DatabaseController to use with the BookingController, can not be null.

    • Method Detail

      • resetBooking

        public void resetBooking()
        Resets all formally made booking actions, all tickets will be lost. Creates a new active booking and a new booking number for that particular booking. Does not delete booking from the database.

      • addTicketToBooking

        public void addTicketToBooking(Ticket ticket)
        Adds a ticket to active booking.
        Parameters:
        ticket - to be added to the active booking, can not be null.

      • getBookingNumber

        public java.lang.String getBookingNumber()
        Returns the booking number for the active booking.
        Returns:
        booking number of active booking.

      • cancelBooking

        public boolean cancelBooking(java.lang.String bookingNumber)
                      throws java.sql.SQLException
        Removes booking from the database with a specific booking number. Returns true if the booking was in database and deletion was done successfully else returns false.
        Parameters:
        bookingNumber - of booking to be deleted from the database.
        Returns:
        true if deletion was done successfully.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • deleteTicket

        public void deleteTicket(Ticket ticket)
        Deletes a ticket from active booking.
        Parameters:
        ticket - to be deleted to the active booking, cannot be null.

      • confirmBooking

        public void confirmBooking()
                    throws java.sql.SQLException
        Save active booking to the database. If the booking was saved successfully, the active booking will be reset and a new booking made (with a new booking number). Will return true if successful else false.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • getBookingFromDB

        public Booking getBookingFromDB(java.lang.String bookingNumber)
        Gets booking with a specific booking number from the database.
        Parameters:
        bookingNumber - of the booking to get from the database, cannot be null.
        Returns:
        booking with given booking number, null if not in the database.

      • getBooking

        public Booking getBooking()
        Gets and return active booking.
        Returns:
        active booking.

      • getDb

        public DatabaseController getDb()
        Gets and returns DatabaseController attached to the BookingController.
        Returns:
        attached databaseController.

      • getAvailableSeats

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getAvailableSeats(Flight flight)
        Gets all available seats on a specific flight.
        Parameters:
        flight - to check for available seats, cannot be null.
        Returns:
        list of all seats available.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
